name: Just a Farming Sim
description:
Welcome to your new farm! The soil here is amazing, crops grow incredibly quickly, and the nearby town buys and sells anything you need. Don't mind the little rabbits that come out at night, they're h̵̢͔̋̈́̇͂̇ủ̴̢̝̹̞͖̜̗̤͉̦̝͈̹̋̊̂͒̅̊̉͜͝͠͠͝ń̵͉̘̝͊̕ͅg̶͚̅̌̓̓r̶̢̧͓͈͖̱̗̣̈́̑͌̃̅̊͊̆͒̄̆̅̒̾̚ÿ̸̢̛͎̗̯̯̘̖̝̟̯̾͝͝   harmless.

Just a Farming Sim is a survival horror farming game. During the day you harvest your crops, buy and sell in town, chat with the townsfolk, explore and customize your farm, plant new seeds, and unlock upgrades for yourself and your equipment. Then the sun sets, and you must defend your crops and your life from the horrors that hunger.

The game has several hours of content but is ultimately an endless game. As of right now, there is no final ending.

Created by five students over a couple months:
Andrew Thompson (hello that's me) - Developer
Lauren Weatherford - Character Design & Town Mechanics
Eli Hoyt - 3D Modeling & Animation / 2D Environment
Mitchell Torres - 3D Modeling & Animation
Caitlin McBride - NPC Dialogue
